Enjoyed playing a recital this afternoon at the @FoundlingMuseum with Paul Mckenzie. Beautiful venue and very recep… https://t.co/7xfPkRRwpX
Thanks @4barsrest for the article! Looking forward to this new challenge :) https://t.co/yKw2mmvxyI
@sykotuba @LaurenJessicaC thanks Steve! Good to see you all again as well. We really enjoyed the very special night! Hope to see you soon!
Great to hear @stephensykes88h again tonight! Sounding fantastic man! https://t.co/qizY67qNsZ
Otw to conduct @7TunnelBand in one of the last reh before the concert on Saturday. Great mix of repertiore and @smithycornet guest soloist!
Paris with @LaurenJessicaC :) https://t.co/i9FvuMyRoP
Regent's Park with @LaurenJessicaC :) https://t.co/NxewmBXGAB
Good luck to Dublin Silver Band at #NABBA16 today!
Wow! FCBB with a fantastic performance on From Ancient Times. Live stream going on all weekend! #nabba16
Enjoying working on @DanHallComposer's new euphonium work "El Macau Funk"! Great new piece that will be a fantastic addition to the rep!
Great to win the area for the 3rd time in 4 years in the UK! Well done @TheFlowersBand :)
Looking forward to performing as a guest soloist with the RAF Central Band this evening at the @RWCMD and with LSO trumpeter Phil Cobb!
City in the Sea - Nigel Clarke https://t.co/pAjn31LYLq via @YouTube
Doing a bit of recording this evening with Christopher Williams in the Dora Stoutzker Hall. What a great venue! https://t.co/z2Ggb2tIim
Happy to announce that I've been appointed as the new conductor of the @7TunnelBand! Excited for the new challenge and looking forward to it
Otw to conduct @7TunnelBand again tonight. Will be great to spend some time on the area piece! Looking forward to it :)
Cant wait to play this in St. Davids hall today! https://t.co/861ujzZD00
Early start with @TheFlowersBand this morning. Now otw back to Wales to record with @RWCMDBrassBand for #BandCymru prelim round!
this is very sad to watch...get a grip united!
What a shock it was to be nominated for @4barsrest 'Player of the Year' award!! What an incredible honor to be amongst such great players :)
Playing as a soloist with the U.S Open Champs this evening. Should be a fantastic concert by DSB! https://t.co/BqKz5vb0mT
Only 2 days until I venture off to Interlochen again for the first time since 2011! It will be such a pleasure to be back :)
@CoffmanBand @DublinCoffmanHS thanks for having me back! It was great to see some familiar faces and to hear the fabulous work being done!
Recording with @eu4ia_4tet today, another solo recording Wednesday and Switzerland over the weekend before heading home for the holidays. :)
Excited to perform Wednesday for the first time with 'Boundless' trio at the @RWCMD. @maxirelandperc @diogo_cgomes #sketchesofpiazzolla
Looking forward to this Wednesday. Concert with 'Boundless'. Featuring the music of Astor Piazzolla at the RWCMD's DS Hall! See you there!
Otw to Torquay to play Dances and Alleluias with Aldbourne Band. Cant wait to play such a fabulous piece of music! :)
Last night's concert with @Coryband what an experience! Thanks so much again everyone :) https://t.co/nHZMixzmCG
@AustinPanttawel @RWCMD @Coryband @philipharper1 thanks Austin! It was a fabulous experience that ill always remember! Take care :)
Amazing performance in the RAH today with @TheFlowersBand . Gala concert to come :)
@7TunnelBand thanks for having me! Good luck for the upcoming contest and hope to see you all again soon!
Back with @7tunnelband tonight for more rehearsals on Gregson's 'Laudate Dominum'. Should be a fun end of a long week!
Doing a bit of conducting this evening with Severn Tunnel band. Should be great to see the band once again :)
Buckeye defense keeping them alive right now..
Come on Buckeyes show up!
...and J.T.
Forget it, Hokies. Cardale and Braxton too much!
How more obvious does it need to be he caught it!!!? #buckeyenation
Not this year, Hokies!! #buckeyenation
@fodensband thanks so much. Such a great experience and the band sounded on fantastic form! Hope to see you all again soon. ::)
Excited to be playing with @fodensband at the British Open Gala concert in Birmingham today! Will be an incredible experience!
Enjoyed playing in my first British Open with @TheFlowersBand! Great atmosphere and cant wait to get on stage w/ Fodens Band tomorrow!
Back to the grind today with @eu4ia_4tet this afternoon and then more Open rehearsals with @TheFlowersBand!
JFK airport packed as always...last hour on American soil till Xmas time! Flight to Amsterdam then Cardiff ahead!
Sitting in CMH airport waiting to go back to Wales after a great trip home. Can't wait for the next couple weeks :)
Memphis is the real deal!
Smh Carrick...
Less than a week now till the Falcone competition. Can't wait to get the chance to perform there again and play this great music!
Pretty cool to see on my iTunes :) http://t.co/wk71GIHG5J
In final stages of putting together my first solo CD! Thanks to @MangoGraphics for doing the cover! More coming soon! http://t.co/vc9xJ6gClm
First time in yrs playing Annie Laurie as my 1st teacher Jeff Keller was accompanying! @philipharper1 Hebridean Lullaby another great one!
Last night was fun rehearsing with the Dublin Cornet Band. Playing solos tomorrow night as part of an opening for the Dublin Irish Fest!
Rehearsed with Chapel Brass this morning for tomorrows concert. Should be a great event with some old friends!
Euph is finally back in my possession. 3 solo concerts with Chapel Brass, Dublin Cornet band, and Dublin Silver Band coming up this week!
Finally back home after a long day of travelling yesterday. Euph didn't make it quite yet but fingers crossed it gets here safely today!
Otw back to Columbus today. 17 hours and 4 airports ahead. Looks like I'll need a neck pillow ;)
Two concerts in the Cheltenham Music Festival today with @TheFlowersBand including the entirety of Pictures at an Exhibition! Cant wait!
Great concert at a packed Cheltenham Town Hall with @TheFlowersBand this morning! http://t.co/Fh5IiPfiAF
Cool to be playing for the first time on the end with @TheFlowersBand at Cheltenham town hall today! http://t.co/wa81lkTMIS
Moving in day is finally here! :)
House nearly packed and ready to move!
Adjudicating the Drybrook solo and quartet contest today. Should be a fun day!
Thanks to @diogo_cgomes and @maxirelandperc for helping me record the last two tracks for my CD today! Stunning playing!
Recording a few tracks with Christopher Williams this afternoon at the @RWCMD. Only today And tomorrow then I'm finished with my first CD!
Preparing this week to record the rest of my CD next week. Its been a great experience and thanks to everyone who has been a part of it!
Playing Rite of Spring on bass trumpet with Bath Symphony Orchestra today. Should be great if I can just find how to get the water out! :P
Huge thanks to @9foot and @TheFlowersBand for helping me with my CD this past weekend. Top quality playing and I really enjoyed it :)
Czardas finished. Next is Napoli. Really enjoying recording today :) http://t.co/XjSrcDkid4
Recording day 2 with @TheFlowersBand today. Brett Baker sounding great on his pieces so far and I can't wait to hear more new music today!
Excited to have the opportunity to record with @TheFlowersBand this weekend. Should be a great time :)
Should be great to work on something a bit different! http://t.co/ywXkQjjKfQ
Photo from my recital yesterday. Thanks to everyone who attended! http://t.co/bbu5jwwss1
Really enjoyed my recital today! Thanks for everyone who came out to support me!
Off to Saddleworth today for my first whit friday with @OldhamBandLees
Here are some program details for my recital a week from today! Really looking forward to giving 3 world premières! http://t.co/7bpLhTABPy
Have you heard ‘Ronald Jenkees - Disorganized Fun’ by troysnoise on #SoundCloud? #np https://t.co/0caKudST9p
"Sketches of Piazzolla" 17th of June in the RWCMD Foyer with @diogo_cgomes. Hope to see you there! https://t.co/vXyo1CG3Ob
Can't wait for this in a couple weeks! http://t.co/bx1hxaxzcP
Fantastic recital this morning from @LaurenJessicaC - great playing :)
Couple recitals to watch in college today then off to Manchester to rehearse with @OldhamBandLees
Best of luck to @LaurenJessicaC in her end of year recital this morning!
Couple runs through "Reflections on Swan Lake" tonight. Sounds like it'll be another great one for the Open!
More rehearsals and photoshoot with @diogo_cgomes and @MangoGraphics yesterday for our upcoming concert on 17th June! http://t.co/aNUaFB9pT3
Back after an excellent day in London yesterday with @eu4ia_4tet at Wellington Barracks. Really enjoyable to play in the guards museum!
